More for You🎁: We promise a 3-year replacement warranty for any quality issues, we will also provide some useful accessories like tripod if needed. Please feel free to contact us, we’ll reply in 24h.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable high quality webcam
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an external webcam for my MacBook Pro so that I could use my larger, external monitor instead of the MacBook's camera. I really like this webcam. The image quality is great - in my opinion it is better than my MacBook Pro's camera. One metric I am using to make that judgment is how well it handles isolating me when using a virtual background in Microsoft Teams. I usually wear a headset with a microphone boom when I am calls with my co-workers and the MacBook's camera struggles to isolate it, usually completely cutting off the microphone. The MacBook's camera also struggles to find the edges of my head, even though I have extremely short hair.This webcam can properly find the edges of my head and can also isolate the microphone on my headset easily. The lens is wider than the MacBook's camera and I like that. The webcam was completely plug and play. I just plugged it into my laptop and it was detected and available for use in Teams and Zoom. I also plugged this into my Windows 11 PC to see if it would just run and it was the same way. I didn't need to download any drivers or software. I just plugged it in and I could detect/use it in Teams and in the basic Camera app.I also really like that the camera can be closed and the lens is completely covered. There is no way that the lens can see anything when the camera is closed. Definitely nice from a privacy standpoint. The LED light can be switched on and off as needed. It doesn't provide much light in my environment but it's not bad if you need it.I recommend this webcam if you need a quality, affordable external webcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera and super easy to seup
reviews.reviewText: I have used the GUSGU G940 HD Webcam for about 2 weeks now, mostly using TEAMs and it has worked extremely well, very easy to setup and great image quality. The microphone works really well and I don't longer need to use my headsets as I used to with previous webcam.I was also very impressed to see that you can order free accessories and I like that the company is helping the environment by asking the users to request the ones that needed only. Excellent initiative !Also, thank you to Catherine in customer service as she was very nice and helpful with my request.Overall, I highly recommend this camera for anyone looking for a high quality webcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feature Packed Web Cam with Impressive Resolution
reviews.reviewText: The GUSGU 2K QHD Webcam with Sony Sensor is a feature-packed web camera designed to meet the needs of both casual users and professionals alike. Offering an impressive resolution and advanced technology, this webcam promises to elevate your video calling, streaming, and online communication experience.Image and Video Quality: The 2K QHD resolution ensures crystal-clear visuals with vivid colors and sharp details in video conferences, live streaming, or creating content for your online audience, this webcam delivers impressive performance.Low Light Performance: The webcam's Sony Sensor also excels in low-light conditions, capturing well-lit and clear footage even in dimly lit environments.Built-in Microphone: The integrated microphone provides decent audio quality for most everyday use cases. It eliminates the need for an external microphone for casual video calls and conferencing.Privacy Protection: The GUSGU 2K QHD Webcam comes with a privacy protection feature which the physical shutter allows you to cover the camera when not in use, ensuring your privacy and providing peace of mind.Plug & Play: The USB plug-and-play functionality means you can connect it to your PC, laptop, desktop, or Mac without any additional drivers or software installations. This is particularly convenient for non-tech-savvy users who want a hassle-free setup.Compatibility: The webcam is compatible with most major operating systems, including Windows, macOS, and Linux, making it versatile and accessible to a wide range of users.Design and Build Quality: The GUSGU webcam boasts a sleek and modern design that will complement any setup. Its compact size makes it easy to place on top of your monitor or laptop without obstructing the view. The build quality feels robust, ensuring durability and longevity.Versatility: The GUSGU webcam is not only suitable for video conferencing and streaming but also for various other applications such as online gaming, content creation, vlogging, and more. Its high-resolution capabilities and low-light performance make it a versatile tool for different needs.Potential Improvement: While the integrated microphone is convenient for basic use, it may not be sufficient for professional-level audio quality. Users who require top-notch audio should consider pairing the webcam with an external microphone.Final Verdict: The GUSGU 2K QHD Webcam with Sony Sensor is a commendable webcam offering outstanding image quality, low-light performance, and privacy protection. Its plug-and-play functionality, sleek design, and compatibility with various operating systems make it an attractive option for users seeking an upgrade to their video communication setup. Whether you're a professional streamer, content creator, or a remote worker attending regular video meetings, this webcam is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Cheap Webcam
reviews.reviewText: Great hd webcam. Very fast shipping, plug in play set up. Light on the side of the cam which is very helpful for dark situations . Easy installation. Very nice picture on videos. Good quality camera. Good value. Would recommend if on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful product.
reviews.reviewText: Upon testing out my new G940 I found the image to be crystal clear, it has a built in light on it, which was quite nice. It was a plug and play on my computer, didn't need to download anything. Works great in OBS after fixing the settings. Definitely recommend buying this one folks.

Great camera for work calls. worked out of the box on my MAC, and has great white balance. it's a wider angle view so it appears as if you are sitting further back - making you appear smaller on camera, so just be aware of what's the field of view if you don't use a background. quick shipping and the seller was fast to answer questions via support.

Estaba buscando una cámara X porque solo la quería para hacer pruebas con otras cosas (face tracking para simuladores) y no para video conferencias.Vi esta Gusgu 910 y se veía muy buena para ser real, incluso todos los comentarios tiene una leyenda con "recibió el producto gratis" lo cual no daba tanta legitimidad. Pero la compré porque, de nuevo, no la quería para algo serio.La calidad de construcción no se siente barata (comparado a su precio)La calidad de vídeo es impresionantemente buena, a la par de los mid-range de Logitech. Muy buen lente y se ve muy bien.Tiene un area touch para cambiar la luz y su intensidad. (Baja, media, alta para o luz azul o luz naranja para proteger los ojos).La única cosa mala es que el cable es pequeño, talvez metro y medio.Viene con adaptador a entrada type-C pero no detecta la cámara en Type-C (el adaptador funciona pero no con la cámara (en una PC de escritorio))Aún así es 5 estrellas de 5. Sorpresivamente perfecta no sólo para mí uso pero para todo.SI Compra esta web si necesitas una BUENA cámara web.NO Compres si necesitas una TREMENDA cámara web - algo como 4K o 60 fps.
